data.text: @Miley_fluff @Tupakavelli That’s why I think he called his home Neverland because the poor children who have been abused could go there and it was like no PTSD ever happened it never happened all the bad things that happened to them it was like comfort and solace to their hearts and souls in Neverland🙏✝️

@Tupakavelli I don't have time for libtards. Ur on a victim if u agree to it. Ur a freak u shouldn't be anywhere near the uniform u have on. U don't like America leave. Why should we apologize for being the best. Muslims still inslave rape there victims u need to live there then cry to me

@David22133468 He was a child. And probably a victim also of pedophiles. He does take there money, but why would they want him to expose them? Can you answer that? How is he a sale out if he is doing what they want?
Either way, he is still a victim, tho a perpetrator.
@Tupakavelli He's not a child and he is part of it. He takes there money and dose what he is told. I don't fill sorry for the sale out.

@Tupakavelli I can only talk about things that I know something about.
Everyone can read the court documents.
But I'm not a detective who can detect in a murder.
So I can talk about the allegations because there are documents to it.

@TauschManuela I respect Michael. He exposed what he saw wrong in our society. Michael couldn't live with himself anymore for being a main player in #ChildTrafficking in Hollywood. And he paid the price he knew.
If u truly honor Michael, u would put his murder in perspective & talk about it.
